title: Malik Shakir Bashir Awan wins NA-87 election
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 9 (APP): Pakistan Muslim League Nawaz Candidate Malik Shakir Bashir Awan has won the election for National Assembly constituency NA-87 Khushab-I by securing 1,17,773 votes.
According to the unofficial result issued by the Returning Officer/ECP, his runner-up was Independent candidate Umer Aslam Khan, who bagged 108,308 votes.
Overall votersâ€™ turn-out remained 55.39 percent.
